```{python}
import pandas as pd
# This is a template, need to update
skills_data = {
    "Name": ["Anu", "Cindy", "Gavin"],
    "Python": [5, 3, 4, 2],
    "SQL": [4, 2, 5, 3],
    "Machine Learning": [3, 1, 4, 2],
    "Cloud Computing": [2, 2, 3, 1]
}

df_skills = pd.DataFrame(skills_data)
df_skills.set_index("Name", inplace=True)
df_skills 
```

```{python}
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.figure(figsize=(8, 6))
sns.heatmap(df_skills, annot=True, cmap="coolwarm", linewidths=0.5)
plt.title("Team Skill Levels Heatmap")

# Save to figures folder
plt.savefig("figures/team_skill_heatmap.png", bbox_inches="tight")
plt.show()
```
